data.comment: Benfica kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Rio Ave.
In the minute 1, Corner awarded to Benfica.
Rio Ave needs to be cautious. Benfica have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio dos Arcos.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 4, Joao Pinheiro signals a Benfica throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
In the minute 6, Jan Vertonghen of Benfica smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Luca Waldschmidt puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Everton instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 8, Free kick Rio Ave.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Chico Geraldes of Rio Ave is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 11, In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Andre Almeida is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 14, Benfica have a goal kick.
The away team has substituted Andre Almeida with Gilberto. Jorge Jesus is thus making his first change.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Throw-in Benfica.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
In the minute 18, Rio Ave's Ivo Pinto gets in a shot on goal at Estadio dos Arcos. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Benfica.
Benfica drive forward but Darwin Nunez is judged offside.
In the minute 25, In Vila do Conde Benfica drive forward through Rafa Silva. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Benfica to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Benfica.
Joao Pinheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 31, Joao Pinheiro blows against Benfica's Luca Waldschmidt for offside.
Goal kick for Benfica at Estadio dos Arcos.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Rio Ave's Bruno Moreira is whistled for offside at Estadio dos Arcos.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Benfica.
In the minute 34, Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Benfica.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
In the minute 36, Joao Pinheiro signals a Benfica throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benfica's half?
In the minute 38, Chico Geraldes for Rio Ave drives towards goal at Estadio dos Arcos. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Joao Pinheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila do Conde.
In the minute 40, Throw-in high up the field for Benfica in Vila do Conde.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Rio Ave.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Rio Ave.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Benfica capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rio Ave's half?
In the minute 43, Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Benfica drive upfield and Darwin Nunez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Rio Ave defender.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Benfica throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
In Vila do Conde Rio Ave's Carlos Mane is caught offside.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Bruno Moreira for the home team is judged to be offside.
Benfica are pushing forward but Alex Grimaldo's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Rio Ave goal kick.
In the minute 45, In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Goal! Benfica extend their lead to 0-2 through Luca Waldschmidt.
That's a fine assist from Darwin Nunez.
The second half is underway in Vila do Conde - Rio Ave with the kick-off.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Benfica.
Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Benfica throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
In the minute 51, Joao Pinheiro awards Rio Ave a goal kick.
In Vila do Conde Benfica attack through Darwin Nunez. The finish is off target, however.
Rio Ave have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Rio Ave have a dangerous throw-in.
Rio Ave drives forward and Lucas Piazon gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
In the minute 54, Joao Pinheiro signals a throw-in for Rio Ave, close to Benfica's area.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
In the minute 57, Free kick Benfica.
Free kick Benfica.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Benfica.
In the minute 59, Benfica pushes forward through Alex Grimaldo, whose finish on goal is saved.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
In the minute 62, Gama (Rio Ave) is making a first substitution, with Gelson Dala replacing Tarantini.
Ronan Jeronimo is on a sub for Chico Geraldes for Rio Ave.
In the minute 63, Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Throw-in for Rio Ave close to the penalty box.
The home team have replaced Bruno Moreira with Pele. This is the third substitution made today by Gama.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
In the minute 66, In Vila do Conde Rio Ave's Lucas Piazon is caught offside.
Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Rio Ave.
Benfica make their second substitution with Julian Weigl replacing Everton.
In the minute 67, Darwin Nunez for the away team is judged to be offside.
Joao Pinheiro blows against Benfica's Darwin Nunez for offside.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Can Rio Ave capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Benfica's half?
In the minute 76, Benfica's Darwin Nunez is whistled for offside at Estadio dos Arcos.
The home team replace Lucas Piazon with Diego Lopes.
Gabrielzinho is replacing Carlos Mane for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
In the minute 77, Joao Pinheiro waits before resuming play because Darwin Nunez for Benfica is still down.
Important block from the Benfica defence as Gabrielzinho fires in a strike for Rio Ave.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
In the minute 78, Darwin Nunez is back on the pitch.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Rio Ave just outside Benfica's area.
Gilberto (Benfica) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 80, Nicolas Otamendi (Benfica) has received a first yellow card.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Nuno Tavares is replacing Rafa Silva for the away team.
In the minute 81, Darwin Nunez, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Haris Seferovic is the substitute for Benfica.
At Estadio dos Arcos, Ivo Pinto has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
Joao Pinheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Benfica.
In the minute 84, Goal! Gabriel Appelt extends Benfica's lead to 0-3.
In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 87, Rio Ave's Ivo Pinto has run offside.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Rio Ave close to the penalty box.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Benfica throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joao Pinheiro blows against Rio Ave's Ronan Jeronimo for offside.
Full-time! The final score is 0-3.
Julian Weigl (Benfica) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
